title: FOR SALE: Immaculate 2 Bed on320 Apartment
details:
Peaceful and airy, this delightful On320 apartment is available for immediate sale.
Over-looking the pool, the apartment covers 980 sq.ft. and comprises: 2 Bedroom (Master Ensuite), Guest Bathroom, Kitchen, Sitting & Dining Room, Balcony, Maid’s Bathroom, and Car Parking Space.

On320 residents also enjoy access to unparalleled facilities, including: Swimming Pool (Children’s, General and Lap Pool), 2500 sq.ft. Gym, Function Room, Food City Convenience Store, and Games Room.

Early viewing is highly recommended.

Website: www.britbrokers.com
